scripts.cyo: npm run clean-reports | cross-env NODE_PATH=cypress cypress open --env configFile=qa
scripts.cyr: npm run clean-reports | cross-env NODE_PATH=cypress cypress run --record --key=83661b7d-cd6f-46b5-9226-3c354a6b9c7e --parallel --env configFile=qa --ci-build-id=teste
scripts.cy:tags: npm run clean-reports | cross-env NODE_PATH=.bin cypress-tags run -e
